content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add any pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ get into the stitch-mas spirit with a quick and festive make the **wheat stitch crochet wreath** pattern transforms two simple rectangles worked in my ** signature wheat stitch™ 1 ** into a beautifully textured holiday wreath perfect for decorating your home gifting to neighbors or adding handmade charm to your christmas décor make a classic green wreath… or go bold with unexpected color combinations with four sizes to choose from these wreaths make adorable wall décor mantle accents door ornaments or even holiday table decorations if you enjoy fast holiday crochet patterns that look better than store-bought this one s knot your average wreath a video tutorial is included in the pattern 2 **crochet hook ** g+/7 4 5mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 wreath forms 4 5 7 5 11 7 16 wreath form 8 **yarn ** wecrochet brava tweed 9 97% premium acrylic/3% viscose 218yds/100g **yarn quantities ** wreath 50 120 240 395 yds bow 45 120 275 445 yds **yarn substitutions ** lion brand heartland 10 - 100% acrylic 251yds/142g herrschners worsted 8 heathers 11 - 100% acrylic 489yds/226g mary maxim maximum value 12 - 100% acrylic 474yds/227g herrschners supreme worsted 13 - 100% acrylic 169yds/100g herrschners worsted sparkle 14 - 92% acrylic/8% polyester 489yds/226g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** not critical for this design 15 sts by 13 row = 4 by 4 in stitch pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 15 **sizes ** 4 sizes -xs to large **skill level ** advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 16 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 17 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 18 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 19 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 20 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 21 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner we understand that you may want to put your spin on things if you re feeling adventurous and want to make tweaks like using different yarn or adjusting
